full_text: United States Government MEMORANDUM MCC NEW YORK Page 1730 DATE: July 24, 2019 TO: Lieutenant's Office FROM: [b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Ph.D. RE: REMOVE FROM SUICIDE WATCH AND PLACE ON PSYCHOLOGICAL OBSERVATION Please remove inmate Epstein #76318-054 from Suicide Watch and place him on Psychological Observation.

text_blocks.content: United States Government MEMORANDUM MCC NEW YORK
FEDERAL BUREAU OF PRISONS DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE
DATE: July 24, 2019 TO: Lieutenant's Office FROM: [b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Ph.D. RE: REMOVE FROM SUICIDE WATCH AND PLACE ON PSYCHOLOGICAL OBSERVATION
Please remove inmate Epstein #76318-054 from Suicide Watch and place him on Psychological Observation.

additional_notes: The document contains redactions and a signature. The document is a memorandum from the Federal Bureau of Prisons.
